import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function App() { const vols=[ {numVol:1,depart:"Fes",Arrivee:"Madrid", places:[ {numPlace:1,tarif:1000, libre:true}, {numPlace:2,tarif:1100, libre:true }, {numPlace:3,tarif:11100, libre:true }, ]}, {numVol:2,depart:"Fes",Arrivee:"London", places:[ {numPlace:1,tarif:2500, libre:true }, {numPlace:2,tarif:3000, libre:true }, {numPlace:3,tarif:2500, libre:true }, ]}, {numVol:3,depart:"Fes",Arrivee:"Bern", places:[ {numPlace:1,tarif:3500, libre:true }, {numPlace:2,tarif:3000, libre:true}, {numPlace:3,tarif:4000, libre:true}, ]} ] const[numVol,setNumVol]=useState() const[vol,setVol]=useState() function rechercher(){ setVol(vols.find((e)=>e.numVol==numVol)) } function suppremer(id){ setVol(vol.filter((li)=>li.numPlace!==id)) } return (
